title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 217-1.4 - Issuance of certificate of inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 217-1.4 - Issuance of certificate of inspection

State Regulations

No official inspection station as defined by 15 NYCRR
79.1
(g) may issue an emission certificate of inspection, as defined by 15 NYCRR
79.1
(a), for a motor vehicle, unless that motor vehicle meets the requirements
of section 217- 1.3 of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
217-1.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
